release_notes:
• feat: Add responsive layout for ultrawide screens
• feat: Add Yearly Wrapped and FIRE Calculator
• chore: Remove redundant artifact upload step
• fix: Fix type mismatch in data_management_screen
• feat: Add asset type detection and unrealized gains to CSV import
• Fix stale data issues with automatic cleanup
• Add debug logging and orphan cleanup for sync issues
• Switch to explicit sync (Option B) - more reliable
• Fix data migration and favicon
• Implement real-time Firestore listeners for automatic sync
